text: Credit : Bravo Bethenny Frankel Gets Real About “ Tortuous ” Divorce on ‘ RHONY ’ Reunion Part 2 by 0 Shares Advertisement Bethenny Frankel hasn ’ t been able to escape Jason Hoppy since filing for divorce in December 2012. Though the Real Housewives of New York star has remained relatively private about her difficult relationship with her ex - husband, she opened up about the “ torment and torture ” she ’ s faced on last night ’ s reunion part 2 episode. The Skinnygirl creator discussed the aftermath of the harassment and stalking charges brought against Jason and how difficult life has been since the split.
